events.title: Tech Vision 2025
events.description: A one-day seminar on emerging technologies, including AI, Blockchain & Quantum Computing. Keynote speakers include industry leaders from top tech firms.

events.title: Data Science Summit
events.description: Deep dive into data science, machine learning, and analytics. Learn from industry experts about the latest trends and technologies.

events.title: Web Development Workshop
events.description: Hands-on workshop covering modern web development technologies, frameworks, & best practices help you succeed in the evolving world of web development.

events.title: Cloud Computing Conference
events.description: Explore cloud technologies, serverless architecture, and DevOps practices. Featuring workshops and hands-on sessions.

events.title: Cybersecurity Workshop
events.description: Learn about the latest cybersecurity threats and defense strategies. Includes practical sessions on security tools and techniques.

events.title: Mobile App Development
events.description: Comprehensive workshop on mobile app development using React Native and Flutter. Build cross-platform apps efficiently.
